title: The Bucks Stop There, Pelicans Down for the Count, and Drake Is Still Weird | Heat Check
description:
Instant Replay (03:24): News from around the league, including the end of the Bucks’ win streak, Dion Waiters's latest suspension, the excellent clapbacks from CJ McCollum, and more.
The Main Event (18:32): Micah Peters stops in to talk to the gang about the absolute mess the Pelicans are in, and whether Zion and all the team's missing parts can even fix it.
Good Call/Bad Call (30:11): Drake is being really weird again, gambling for 3-point shots, and we get Cubas mixed up. 
Host: Jawn Gonzalez
Guests: Haley O’Shaughnessy, Dan Devine, Micah Peters

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
